subject: refactor(ui): replace tabs and split panel with drawer and modals
body:
Remove tab navigation (Graph/Conventions tabs). Graph is now always
visible as the primary view. Conventions and Analysis moved from
inline panels/tabs to modals accessible via the burger menu.

Detail panel replaced with an overlay DetailDrawer component:
- Mobile: bottom sheet sliding up with drag handle and backdrop
- Desktop: side panel sliding in from right with close button
- Uses CSS transforms for GPU-accelerated animation instead of
  width/height transitions that caused layout reflow

Previous SplitPanel push-layout was too subtle â€” users reported
not seeing any detail view when clicking nodes/arcs.
